sn26.1:1.2: “Yo kho, bhikkhave, cakkhussa uppado thiti abhinibbatti patubhavo, dukkhasseso uppado, roganam thiti, jaramaranassa patubhavo.
sn26.1:1.7: yo manassa uppado thiti abhinibbatti patubhavo, dukkhasseso uppado, roganam thiti, jaramaranassa patubhavo.
sn26.1:1.8: Yo ca, bhikkhave, cakkhussa nirodho vupasamo atthangamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, roganam vupasamo, jaramaranassa atthangamo.
sn26.1:1.13: yo manassa nirodho vupasamo atthangamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, roganam vupasamo, jaramaranassa atthangamo”ti.
